title: PBE IP and RP
body: hi good day.  I just recently got my PBE account and i already download the client. is just that, i only get 13000 IP and 3000 RP total. i thought that it will be about 900k RP and IP what do i need to do on that thing so i can test more skins or other things to buy?

replies.body:
When players join the PBE, we want to be sure that they can actually test stuff without having to buy it themselves.  According to our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#h2q1), it looks like we're currently adding 10,000 IP and 3,500 RP. 

If you're still not seeing the right totals, you can click on anything in the store and it should force your IP/RP totals to update!
